entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as being inside the room, holding his robes above his knees due to a bloody and mangled leg. He is also speaking to Filch.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is described as being inside the room with Snape, handing him bandages.

relationships.description: Snape and Filch are described as being inside the room together, with Snape speaking to Filch.
Filch is handing bandages to Snape, indicating that Snape has them.
